actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', date) AS time,
       sum(reach) AS "Reach",
       sum(reach_organic) AS "Reach_organic",
       sum(reach_paid) AS "Reach_paid"
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_dashboard_unq_view
WHERE date >= '{{End_Date.selectedDate}}':: date - interval '1 month'
  AND date < '{{End_Date.selectedDate}}':: date 
	AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', date)
ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('day', date)
LIMIT 10000;
